Package Controller

Class ControllerSimulation

java.lang.Object
Controller.Controller
Controller.ControllerSimulation
All Implemented Interfaces:
InterfaceController
Direct Known Subclasses:
ControllerSimulationDayMenu, ControllerSimulationEndMenu, ControllerSimulationMarketMenu, ControllerSimulationMenu, ControllerSimulationPriceMenu, ControllerSimulationStorageMenu
public abstract class ControllerSimulation extends Controller
The abstract ControllerSimulation class provides common functionality for all simulation controllers in the kiosk simulation.
